artificiallifefx

Class ALifeform

  • java.lang.Object
    • artificiallifefx.AnEntity
      • artificiallifefx.ALifeform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACarnivore, AHerbivore

    public abstract class ALifeform
extends AnEntity
    Inherited from AnEntity, this sets up the functions and variables needed by all moving, consuming entities (herbivores and carnivores)
